name: Swing 2D
description:
Welcome to Swing 2D! To shoot a rope, press and hold the left mouse button wherever you want to shoot your rope. Avoid everything but the finish line at the end in the levels, and endless mode is just for free play and coin gathering.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/sscnHcmR

NEW IN VERSION 1.7.0

  • Coins
  • Characters
  • Bug Fixes

CAN'T OPEN ON MAC?

If you are downloading on Mac, you may see the error "Apple cannot open this because it can't check for malicious software." Simply go into Finder, find the downloaded application, right click, then click open. The same warning will pop up, but this time you can just click open to open the app.

ALSO, TO GET OUT OF THE APP, PRESS COMMAND+Q ON MAC AND CONTROL+Q ON WINDOWS.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please comment your ideas and thoughts on this new version, for it is still testing.
